segments.text: Northward Airways , good morning . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , do you have any flights to Sydney next Tuesday afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One moment , please ... Yes . There's a flight at 16:45 and one at 18:00 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . Could you tell me how much a return flight costs ? I'll be staying three weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Economy , business class or first class ticket ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Could I make a reservation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . Which flight would you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Mary Jones , that's M-A-R-Y J-O-N-E-S .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would you like to pay , Ms . Jones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I pay at the check-in desk when I pick up my ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you will have to confirm this reservation at least two hours before departure time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now you have been booked , Ms . Jones . The flight leaves at 16:45 , and your arrival in Sydney will be at 9:00 a . m . , local time . The flight number is NWA 476 .
segments.speaker: S1
